text: Bwebaba bakuwakanyizza, ggwe gamba nti neewaddeyo nzenna ewa Katonda nabuli, yenna angoberera ekyo kyakola, era ogambe abo abaaweebwa ekitabo naabo abatalina kitabo (ba mushirikiina) nti nammwe mwewaddeyo bwe beelangirira nti basiramuse olwonno baba balungamye, bwebatakola batyo, anti ggwe kyoteekwa okukola kubatusaako bubaka era bulijjo Katonda alaba abaddu be (nebyebakola)
